basic.color: Leaf color red green, flower color orange yellow

maintenance.soil: Likes fertile soil with good drainage
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, may grow in places with bright scattered light
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, keep soil moist high, reduce watering when in winter dormancy
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply 1-2 times monthly in spring, summer, and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, dead and diseased leaves timely
